title: A proclamation prohibiting His Majesties subjects to trade within the limits assigned to the Governour and Company of Adventurers of England, Trading into Hudson's Bay, except those of the company James R.
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: "Given at our court at Whitehall the one and thirtieth day of March 1688."
